name: css-column-rule-style
description: Css module of single purpose classes for column rule style

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-column-rule-style.css > css/css-column-rule-style.css && tachyons src/css-column-rule-style.css --minify > css/css-column-rule-style.min.css && tachyons src/css-column-rule-style.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
